entries.attack_notify: Rival ships are en route to the freighter!  Prepare for attack!
entries.attack_stopped: The attack seems to have stopped for the moment.
entries.complete: Mission Accomplished!  Return for further instructions.
entries.quest_location_d: Travel to the Ord Mantell system.
entries.quest_update: Locate the damaged freighter and remove the resources from it!
entries.target_disabled: The freighter is damaged and ripe for the picking!
entries.title: Orion: Resource Salvaging
entries.title_d: Locate the damaged freighter, use your tractor beam to siphon the resources off the ship, and destroy it when you are finished.  Fight off any attackers that might try to stop you.
